title: Looking for a font with these specific letters: 'OC' hi-contrast ellipsoidal - similar to Arcadia {Jared}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202104854im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-23_5473.png)

What's really bothering me about this font is the very thin parts. Can someone help direct me to that font or similar fonts like that? Sorry for it being so blurry

Thank you in advance
author: Miriam.K
